Package de.gnwi.mfsim.model.peptide.base

Class ZMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.mfsim.model.peptide.base.ZMatrix
  • public class ZMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for storing a chemical ZMatrix.
    Author:
    Andreas Truszkowski

      void addDistanceAngleDihedralAngleTriplet​(double aDistance, double anAngle, double aDihedralAngle)
      Sets the distance, the angle and the dihedral angle from atom four and higher.
      void addFirstDistance​(double aDistance)
      Sets the distance between the first two atoms.
      void addFirstDistanceAnglePair​(double aDistance, double anAngle)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZMatrix

        public ZMatrix()
        Creates a new instance.

    • Method Detail

      • addFirstDistance

        public void addFirstDistance​(double aDistance)
        Sets the distance between the first two atoms. Has to be the first entry in the ZMatrix.
        Parameters:
        aDistance - Distance in Angstrom.

      • addFirstDistanceAnglePair

        public void addFirstDistanceAnglePair​(double aDistance,
                                      double anAngle)
                               throws DpdPeptideException
        Sets the distance between the second and the third atom and the angle between the first three atoms. Has to be the second entry in the ZMatrix.
        Parameters:
        aDistance - Distance in Angstrom.
        anAngle - Angle in degrees.
        Throws:
        DpdPeptideException - DpdPeptideException

      • addDistanceAngleDihedralAngleTriplet

        public void addDistanceAngleDihedralAngleTriplet​(double aDistance,
                                                 double anAngle,
                                                 double aDihedralAngle)
                                          throws DpdPeptideException
        Sets the distance, the angle and the dihedral angle from atom four and higher. Entry three or greater in the ZMatrix.
        Parameters:
        aDistance - Distance in Angstrom.
        anAngle - Angle in degrees.
        aDihedralAngle - Dihedral angle in degrees.
        Throws:
        DpdPeptideException - DpdPeptideException

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • getZMatrix

        public java.lang.Double[][] getZMatrix()
        Gets the Z-Matrix. First index: Index of the C-alpha-atoms. Second index: 0 = Atom distance; 1 = Torsion angle; 2 = Dihedral Angle;
        Returns:
        The Z-MAtrix.

      • size

        public int size()
        Gets the size of the ZMatrix.
        Returns:
        Size of the ZMatrix.
